completeDialog.title: Complete hunt
completeDialog.description: This will mark the hunt as completed. You can still view statistics afterwards.

cancelDialog.title: Cancel hunt
cancelDialog.description: Are you sure you want to cancel this hunt? This action may be irreversible.

planRequired.title: Plan required
planRequired.description: You must first activate a plan in the Pricing tab to start your hunt.

tooltips.onlyCountriesDescription: Limit search only to these countries' healthcare workers.
tooltips.preferredCountriesDescription: Score those healthcare professionals higher and start with them.

requirementsChat.title: Requirements Assistant
requirementsChat.subtitle: Let's build your job requirements together
requirementsChat.placeholder: Type your message here... (Press Enter to send)
requirementsChat.errorMessage: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.

errors.sendMessage: Failed to send message. Please try again.

statistics.noInterestedCandidates: We're on the Hunt for Great Talent!
statistics.noInterestedCandidatesDesc: No interested candidates yet, but we're reaching out to professionals who fit your needs. Check back soon! We'll let you know as soon as we have updates.

questions.contextQuestionsDesc: Questions from candidates are collected here. Once answered, they become part of the context for AI-powered responses in future interactions.

errors.paymentIssue: There is an issue with this Hunt pricing, please contact support.
errors.huntCompleteFailed: Failed to complete hunt. Please try again.
errors.huntCancelFailed: Failed to cancel hunt. Please try again.
